content.body: do we have a mechanism for disabling tests as suggested in https://github.com/tc39/test262/issues/3780 ? I don't think we've disabled tests for other proposals such as cleanupSome that were demoted to stage 2 or split off another proposal at stage 2
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: do we have a mechanism for disabling tests as suggested in https://github.com/tc39/test262/issues/3780 ? I don't think we've disabled tests for other proposals such as cleanupSome that were demoted to stage 2 or split off another proposal at stage 2

content.body: i'm not aware of a mechanism to keep the tests in-tree but disabled
good call on cleanupSome i don't even remember what we did then
i'd think we'd just remove them? it's easy to revert the removal later
are there tests for async iterator helpers?
